title: SoloQ matchmaking
body:
Hi,
I believe there is something wrong with the matchmaking. I got matched with an Iron (below bronze) player during my promo match for platinum. My MMR is platinum, and his is iron (1800+ // 1100+). We still won, but clearly not thanks to him (https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/226790528/202326187?tab=overview he was the yasuo).
How can this even happen ?..

1st match: Iron player on my team vs full gold & plat
2nd match: bronze player on my team vs full gold & plat
3rd match: adc dies twice then ragequits

replies.body:
[Another example, a few hours later.](https://imgur.com/a/ar9LDTL)

You get used to it.
Just oce things. [Here's a game played 2 hours ago.](https://imgur.com/a/Gh0Cq1C) Luckily for me (silver 3) the diamond 4 Riven was still a monkey at macro.
